description:
Location: 436 N Bedford Dr. Beverly Hills, CA

Company: Divina Dermatology & Cosmetic Center

www.DivinaDermatology.com


Position: Full-Time or Part-Time Experienced Patient Coordinator

Are you a detail-oriented and compassionate professional with a passion for patient care? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment where your organizational skills and dedication to service make a real difference? Join our esteemed team at our state-of-the-art facility in the heart of Beverly Hills, where we offer a rewarding role for an experienced Patient Coordinator.


About Us: At our premier dermatology facility, we pride ourselves on providing the highest level of care to our discerning clientele. With cutting-edge equipment and a luxurious atmosphere, we offer a top-tier experience for both patients and practitioners.


Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced Patient Coordinator with a strong background in dermatology and cosmetic procedures to join our team on a part-time basis. In this role, you will have the opportunity to showcase your skills in patient management and coordination, ensuring a seamless and exceptional experience for our clients.

Key Responsibilities:


  • Coordinate patient appointments, including scheduling, rescheduling, and confirming consultations and follow-up visits.
  • Provide detailed information to patients about cosmetic dermatology procedures, including injectables (Botox, fillers), lasers (Clear + Brilliant, Sciton), and skin rejuvenation treatments.
  • Manage patient records and ensure accurate and up-to-date documentation.
  • Demonstrate exceptional patient care and service, addressing patient inquiries and concerns with professionalism and empathy.
  • Collaborate with our dedicated support staff and medical professionals to streamline office operations and enhance patient satisfaction.


Benefits:

  • Competitive compensation
  • Access to state-of-the-art equipment and technology
  • Dedicated support staff to assist with administrative tasks
  • Prime location in Beverly Hills, providing ample opportunity for professional development
  • Room for growth within the organization


How to Apply: If you are a self-motivated and ambitious Patient Coordinator seeking a rewarding opportunity in a dynamic environment, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume and cover letter to Info@DivinaDermatology.com

Join us in revolutionizing dermatological and cosmetic care in Beverly Hills, where your dedication and organizational skills contribute to the success and satisfaction of our clients!


Seniority Level:

Mid-Senior level


Industry:

Hospitals and Health Care


Job Functions:

Health Care Provider


Skills:

  • Patient Scheduling
  • Cosmetic Dermatology Knowledge
  • Laser Treatment Familiarity (Clear + Brilliant, Sciton)
  • Botox and Dermal Fillers Knowledge
  • Exceptional Patient Care
  • Administrative Coordination
